snippet: Prosecutors declined on Tuesday to file criminal charges against former Commerce Secretary John Bryson, saying he suffered a seizure that was responsible for a series of traffic accidents.
abstract: Prosecutors decline to file criminal charges against former Commerce Secretary John Bryson, saying he suffered a seizure that was responsible for a series of traffic accidents near Los Angeles.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors declined on Tuesday to file criminal charges against former Commerce Secretary John Bryson, saying he suffered a seizure that was responsible for a series of traffic accidents.

headline.seo: No Charges for John Bryson, Ex-Commerce Secretary
headline.main: California: No Charges for Ex-Commerce Secretary
headline.print_headline: California: No Charges For Ex-Commerce Secretary
